references.reason: This paper is foundational for diffusion models, introducing the core concept and framework that many subsequent diffusion models are built upon.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrated the superiority of diffusion models over GANs in image synthesis, significantly increasing the adoption and interest in the field.

references.paper_title: Understanding diffusion models: A unified perspective
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive and unified overview of diffusion models, clarifying various aspects and concepts related to their design and functionality.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper showcased a groundbreaking achievement in text-to-image generation using diffusion models, significantly impacting the generative AI landscape.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced a method for generating high-resolution images using latent diffusion models, which improved the quality and efficiency of image generation.
